downloadTitle: Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009 White Paper: Setting Up Intercompany for Intracompany Direct Delivery
downloadDescription: This paper describes how to modify the Microsoft Dynamics AX intercompany functionality so it can be used for intracompany direct deliveries.

downloadFile.name: Setting up intercompany for intracompany direct delivery.xps
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/2/d/c2db3786-d3ae-4771-8374-9b8590776df9/Setting up intercompany for intracompany direct delivery.xps

downloadFile.name: Setting up intercompany for intracompany direct delivery.pdf
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/2/d/c2db3786-d3ae-4771-8374-9b8590776df9/Setting up intercompany for intracompany direct delivery.pdf

detailsSection: This paper includes tips and tricks for modifying the setup of the Microsoft Dynamics AX intercompany functionality to handle intracompany direct deliveries. The information describes how to benefit from financial dimensions, specific terms of payment setup, and other features to support the need for intracompany transaction tracking and elimination.
detailsSection_file_name: Setting up intercompany for intracompany direct delivery.xps
Setting up intercompany for intracompany direct delivery.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the PDF file, you will need a PDF reader, such as the free Adobe Reader.
  • To view the XPS file, you will need Windows Vista or the Microsoft XML Paper Specification Essentials Pack.
  • For information about the system requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009, see System requirements for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2009.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the document in PDF file or XPS file format.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
additionalInformationSection:
• You must have an intercompany license to set up this feature.

  • This document supplements the existing intercompany Help information.
